data.title: Money Exchange
data.meta_description: If you are planning a trip to Albania, you will need to exchange your money to the official currency of Albania, the Albanian lek (ALL). The official exchange rate is published every day in the official website of Bank of Albania, and you can read it by clicking here. After arriving in Albania, you can [...]
data.text:
If you are planning a trip to Albania, you will need to exchange your money to the official currency of Albania, the Albanian lek (ALL). The official exchange rate is published every day in the official website of Bank of Albania, and you can read it by clicking here.

After arriving in Albania, you can exchange your money easily in all the bank branches, or in specialized stores, which usually are called: Pikë Këmbimi or Exchange. Before your trip, be sure to consult your home bank to learn more about the transaction fees charged on your credit or debit card.

.
